transcripts.text: That's the abortionist right there.  Dude, you're a coward.
You're a coward.
You pointed the gun.  You saw that, right?  Yeah, yeah.  Okay.
The abortionist just pulled a gun on me.  He did?
He pointed it right at me.

I'm taking us to the police station.  I am at 1615 East Osborne Street, and there was an incident here last week where a gentleman pulled a gun on me, pointed it right at me, and he is here right now.  He just pulled into the parking lot.  I fear he might have his gun.  I'd like you to send some officers over here.  All righty.  I've got a call put in.  Elvis, please, somebody out that way.  If anything changes or he takes off or anything or he starts engaging, would you give us a call, please?  He's here.  Just spotted him.  Same car, same license plates.  You were the one that was assaulted?  Yes, sir.  We like him arrested.  I mean, he pointed a deadly weapon at me, pointed right at my face.
We have that video if you want to witness that.
And you said that... He's in there now?
Right now.
In where now?
In the building right next door.
The KCA Women's Center?
Yeah.
Do you know who this guy is at all?
Yeah.
It was a doctor?
Yeah, he's a doctor.  Dr.  Ronald Yunus.
And we have the video you can examine yourself to witness.

That's the abortionist right there.  Dude, you're a coward!  You're a coward!  This is a still image, if you want to see that.  That's a still image from his car, which is the same car he's driving right now.
Let me do a little research.  I mean, if he works here, he's not going anywhere.

We're asking the police department to do their duty.  The same thing they would do if I had pulled a weapon on an abortionist.  They would have me in handcuffs.  We're asking the police to come and to put this man in handcuffs.  Again, we have the footage itself, and the footage speaks for itself.  Anybody can see it, and I just want to say that if any of the pro-life ministers out here had pulled a weapon on the abortionist last week, I don't think it would be maybe a matter of maybe a couple of hours before action was taken to put one of us in handcuffs, rightly so.
An arrest will not be made today.  I have to go off the evidence that I have.  And right now there's not enough evidence to make an arrest.
What evidence would... So you saw the video.  You saw he pulled a gun out, pointed it at me.  Two witnesses, video witness.  What other evidence would you need?
Well, I saw what you saw.  I saw the video that you showed me.  I saw exactly what you presented to me, the photo as well.  And... I can't conclusively say that's a gun.
I got a quick question for you.
Okay.
In your expert opinion, what does that look like to you?
Looks like a gun to me.
I just want to get your opinion on this.  What does that look like to you here?  Yeah.  I mean, it looks like a gun.
